response.job_title: Product Development Lead at Software Colombia
response.summary: I am a results-oriented Software Engineer with expertise in full-stack development and leading product initiatives. Proficient in front-end and back-end technologies, ensuring seamless integration and optimal user experience. Skilled in translating technical concepts for non-technical stakeholders and excelling into actionable strategies. Adept at innovative problem-solving and delivering impactful, customer-centric solutions.
response.skills: Full-Stack Development, Python (Programming Language), Software Architecture, Version Control, Release Management, Mobile Application Development, Prototyping, Flutter, Dart, WebSocket, NoSQL, Front-End Development, Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD), Web Services, Application Programming Interfaces (API), Representational State Transfer (REST), SOAP, Back-End Web Development, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Java

profile_positions.description: Led cross-functional developing teams fostering innovative culture. Selected optimal full-stack technologies based on their impact on product development. Ensured architectural desings for product's scalability, security, and reliability. Contributed to full-stack development using React and Python. Managed product releases with effective version control.
profile_positions.title: Product Development Lead

profile_positions.description: Developed front-end architecture using React and Angular. Implemented user interfaces with clean, efficient and maintainable code using best practices. Maintained CI/CD pipelines in AWS for optimal deployments. Mentored Junior Developers while sharing team knowledge.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Developer

profile_positions.description: Collaborated with Product Team to design custom REST APIs using Java and JavaScript, deployed on AWS. Adapted code based on client design specifications. Designed data architecture, storage strategy, and implementation roadmaps. Set up Linux servers and virtualized environments with Docker on AWS.
profile_positions.title: Junior Software Developer

profile_positions.description: Designed an embedded solution for aquaponics systems. Developed multi-layered PCBs using CAD tools like KiCad and FreeCAD. Built a cross-platform mobile app using Flutter. Integrated a non-relational database with the app using Google Cloud Functions and Firebase.
profile_positions.title: Student Assistant

company.name: Software Colombia
company.description: Somos especialistas en virtualización de trámites, factura electrónica, firma digital, estampado cronológico y cualquier aplicación de la tecnología PKI.
